steps.label: Described
steps.title: "I want insurance service via WhatsApp"
steps.description: The user described in one sentence what they needed: a complete insurance service and sales system that identifies leads, collects data and offers products.
steps.highlight: One sentence. No code. No technical specification.

steps.label: AI Planned
steps.title: 4-phase plan generated in seconds
steps.description: AI analyzed the request and created a structured plan: prepare specialized agents, build the workflow, implement sales flow and activate WhatsApp integration.
steps.highlight: The user just needed to say "Approved."

steps.label: Executed
steps.title: 3 agents + 1 workflow created automatically
steps.description: AI executed the steps: created 3 specialized AI agents (Identifier, Collector, Seller), selected tools and built the complete workflow with 4 actions.
steps.highlight: The user gave feedback and AI adjusted on the spot.

steps.label: Running
steps.title: Real WhatsApp service in 13 seconds
steps.description: Workflow running: customer sends "Good afternoon" and AI identifies the lead, collects data, offers home and phone insurance — all automatic.
steps.highlight: From sentence to working service: less than 3 minutes.
